Attacks.Name: Bite
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Arbok gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Poison Tail
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: Gunk Shot
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Poison and Stun special conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Intimidate
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 must reroll one success in their attack rolls when targeting Arbok.

Superpowers.Name: Coil
Superpowers.Effect: Arbok gains 1 additional die on its next attack roll and adds 1 die to its defense rolls until the start of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Wrap
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Venomous Wrath
Superpowers.Effect: Arbok may reroll up to two dice in its attack rolls when using poison-type attacks. Additionally, Arbok gains 1 power if the attack deals damage.
